item.title: Eleanor Holmes Norton, an 88-year-old Dem congressional delegate, scammed by phony 'cleaning crew' at DC home

item.title: Trump to jet off to Asia as North Korea fires ballistic missiles and China trade questions loom
item.description: Trump's Asia summit tour includes meetings with Chinese President Xi Jinping and other regional leaders as trade tensions with Beijing escalate.

item.title: US sanctions Colombian president and family over drug trafficking allegations
item.description: Treasury Department accuses Colombian President Petro of enabling cocaine production surge while he calls sanctions a "complete paradox" in response.
